actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A joint resolution authorizing and requesting the President to issue a proclamation designating the period from October 7, 1979 through October 13, 1979 as "National School Bus Safety Week".

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to designate the week of October 7 through October 13, 1979, as "National Schoolbus Safety Week."

titles.title: A joint resolution authorizing and requesting the President to issue a proclamation designating the period from October 7, 1979 through October 13, 1979 as "National School Bus Safety Week".
